name: Hike (itch)
description:
Game for LOWREZJAM 2018

Story:     
you wake up in the dark and try to find the wayout from the area. 
*recommend using headphone.

Control:
- w,a,s,d for control.
- mouse for look around.
- left click for using flashlight.

Changing:
 v. 0.02 - decreased mouse sensitive

Credits:
SFX:

Scary Violin - https://freesound.org/people/lennyboy/sounds/244417/

Gate open - https://freesound.org/people/Koops/sounds/17872/
Gate close - https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/219587/

Font:
a font by Daniel Linssen - https://managore.itch.io/m3x6
